comments:
I am trying to deploy Web Viewer Example on Weblogic 8.1.
i could succesfully deploy 1.0.1 Web Viewer Example which works fine but the 2.1.1  gives the following error : 

java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/eclipse/birt/report/viewer/servlet/ViewerServlet

Please help

Try with the build of May 30, deployment of birt folder, not war file, succeeds in Weblogic 9.0. Then, where do you get birt 2.1.1. Birt is still in the development of 2.1.0 RC5. Please get the latest build from BIRT web and try again.

Can not reproduce this exception in WL 8.1 sp5 and WL 9.0.
What's the pack version of your test enviroment?
I am able to run the reports of runtime 2.1.0 through the weblogic. Now I am not having at least this problem.
Can not reproduce it. And the exception disappeared to the bug reporter.
